price: او څه چې په اسمانو كې دي او څه چې په ځمكه كې دي، هغه (ټول) د الله دي، او الله له هر څه راچاپېر دى.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٖ مُّحِيطٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: walillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wakāna al-lahu bikulli shayin muḥīṭan
